name: An elegant white robe with golden runes
data: It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It increases the users charisma poorly.
It has tiny armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration tremendously.
It increases the users psionic resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users fire resistance a bit.
It increases the users cold resistance a bit.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance a bit.
